001/*

006
007package renderer.scene.util;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010import renderer.scene.primitives.*;
011
012import java.util.ArrayList;
013import java.awt.Color;
014
015/**
016   Convert a {@link Model} object into a point cloud {@link Model}.
017<p>
018   See <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Point_cloud" target="_top">
019                https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Point_cloud</a>
020*/
021public class PointCloud
022{
023   /**
024      A static factory method that converts a given {@link Model}
025      into a {@link Model} made up of only points. This method
026      converts each {@link Primitive} in the {@link Model} into
027      a {@link Points} primitive.
028
029      @param model  {@link Model} to convert into a point cloud
030      @return a {@link Model} that is a point cloud version of the input {@link Model}
031      @throws NullPointerException if {@code model} is {@code null}
032   */
033   public static Model make(final Model model)
034   {
035      return make(model, 0); // set the point size to 0
036   }
037
038
039   /**
040      A static factory method that converts a given {@link Model}
041      into a {@link Model} made up of only points. This method
042      converts each {@link Primitive} in the {@link Model} into
043      a {@link Points} primitive.
044
045      @param model      {@link Model} to convert into a point cloud
046      @param pointSize  size, in pixels, of the {@link Point}s in the point cloud
047      @return a {@link Model} that is a point cloud version of the input {@link Model}
048      @throws NullPointerException if {@code model} is {@code null}
049      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code pointSize} is less than 0
050   */
051   public static Model make(final Model model, final int pointSize)
052   {
053      if (null == model)
054         throw new NullPointerException("model must not be null");
055      if (pointSize < 0)
056         throw new IllegalArgumentException("pointSize must be greater than or equal to 0");
057
058      final Model pointCloud = new Model(new ArrayList<Vertex>(model.vertexList),
059                                         new ArrayList<>(), // empty primitiveList
060                                         new ArrayList<Color>(model.colorList),
061                                         "PointCloud: " + model.name,
062                                         model.getMatrix(),
063                                         new ArrayList<>(), // empty nestedModels
064                                         model.visible,
065                                         model.doBackFaceCulling,
066                                         model.frontFacingIsCCW,
067                                         model.facesHaveTwoSides);
068
069      // Convert every Primitive into a Points primitive.
070      for (final Primitive p : model.primitiveList)
071      {
072         pointCloud.addPrimitive( new Points(p.vIndexList,
073                                             p.cIndexList) );
074      }
075
076      // Set the radius for each new Points primitive.
077      for (final Primitive p : pointCloud.primitiveList)
078      {
079         ((Points)p).radius = pointSize;;
080      }
081
082      // Recursively convert all the nested models.
083      for (final Model m : model.nestedModels)
084      {
085         pointCloud.addNestedModel( make(m, pointSize) );  // recursion
086      }
087
088      return pointCloud;
089   }
090
091
092
093   // Private default constructor to enforce noninstantiable class.
094   // See Item 4 in "Effective Java", 3rd Ed, Joshua Bloch.
095   private PointCloud() {
096      throw new AssertionError();
097   }
098}
